evidence.evidence_text: European Stocks Extend Losses Both the STOXX 50 and the STOXX 600 extended losses on Thursday, falling 0.6% and 0.7%, respectively, as a global tech sell-off resumed amid persistent concerns over AI-related disruption and elevated valuations.

links.source_ref: Bank of England and the ECB monetary policy decisions

evidence.evidence_text: Traders were also digesting a fresh round of corporate earnings and monetary policy decisions from the Bank of England and the ECB that left borrowing costs unchanged as expected.
